subject: Snowboarding
Olympic Games (2010)
X Games
lead_paragraph: The Otsego Club in Gaylord, Mich., built its first Olympic-size halfpipe for this season, and the world’s elite snowboarders are coming in droves to train.
snippet: The Otsego Club in Gaylord, Mich., built its first Olympic-size halfpipe for this season, and the world’s elite snowboarders are coming in droves to train.
